text: The Steve Miller Band is an American blues rock band led by Steve Miller. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Children of the Future (1968) * Sailor (1968) * Brave New World (1969) * Your Saving Grace (1969) * Number 5 (1970) * Rock Love (1971) * Recall the Beginning...A Journey from Eden (1972) * The Joker (1973) * Fly Like an Eagle (1976) * Book of Dreams (1977) * Circle of Love (1981) * Abracadabra (1982) * Italian X Rays (1984) * Living in the 20th Century (1986) * Wide River (1993) * Binjo! (2010) * Let Your Hair Down (2011) Category:1966 establishments in California Category:1960s American music groups Category:1970s American music groups Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American rock bands Category:Blues bands Category:Musical groups established in 1966 Category:Musical groups from San Francisco
title: Steve Miller Band
